name: Furniture and Household Items
title: Furniture and Household Items

api_list.name: Get version
api_list.description: Returns an actual version of the service in format `vX.Y.Z` where X is the version of API.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://furniture-and-household-items.p.rapidapi.com/v1/version"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "furniture-and-household-items.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://furniture-and-household-items.p.rapidapi.com/v1/version"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "furniture-and-household-items.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
